price: Na hatukuziumba mbingu na ardhi na vilivyomo baina yake kwa mchezo.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu hakuumba mbingu na ardhi na viliomo baina yao bila ya hikima.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
